subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: One of the givens in women’s college basketball is that Connecticut will be at the top or close to it. But what has happened to the Huskies this season is anything but typical.
snippet: One of the givens in women’s college basketball is that Connecticut will be at the top or close to it. But what has happened to the Huskies this season is anything but typical.
